entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
